author: sky.cactus
content: Average block time will decrease by ~1 second.  However, missed blocks will now be a thing that may offset that by some unknown amount.

author: sky.cactus
content: Unlike with PoW, if a block proposer doesn't show up someone can't "replace" them.

author: chris2_2_2
content: So there needs to be a new member of the family besides orphans and uncles
